ValidationRule.description:
prevent users from renaming Paychex Inc SA accounts
3/15/23 CM - removed NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")), because merge process runs as SysAdmin and merged the Payx account with a new lead causing issues with user management
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Name), LEFT(PRIORVALUE(Name),11) = 'Paychex Inc', LEFT(Name,11) != 'Paychex Inc')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You do not have permission to rename this account!
